titleStmt.title: Verses on the blessed and happy coronation of Charles the II. king of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, defender of the faith printed at the hearty desires of persons of quality.
titleStmt.author: Rich, John, fl. 1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Francis Eglesfield ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
